S003.notes: Carol has an IEP for reading comprehension. Allow 1.5x time on written assignments. Provide graphic organizers for note-taking.

S005.notes: Emma has a 504 plan. Extended time on all assessments. May provide oral responses for written work. Chunk assignments into smaller sections.

S009.notes: Iris has a 504 plan for ADHD. Extended time and preferential seating. Check for understanding frequently.
